Test Curves (Input Files)

These files contain parameters for the field prime, curve coefficients, base point,
order, and cofactor. They are used by the test harness in the next section.

Listing 4.8: 160-bit curve

What it is
- Example 160-bit field curve and base point parameters for testing.
```
File: Curve_160_params.dat
prime
ac000000000000000000000000000000000000001
order
ac0000000000000000006543ba11adf8eb6345c77
cofactor
1
curve(a4 a6)
1
782e
basepoint(x y)
1680bbdc87647f3c382902d2f58d2754b39bca877
a08957b09764ae59da8fb3058efef9c428e497268
```

Listing 4.9: 256-bit curve

What it is
- Example 256-bit field curve and base point parameters for testing.
```
File: Curve_256_params.dat

1
curve(a4 a6)
1
a87
basepoint(x y)
2310115d283e49377820195c8e67781b6f112a625b14b747fa4cc13d06eba0919
51277aeb91946f0cb83053a10f67c5a9ef00a4f0cf2466b3bedf4fdcd774b574
```
